description.german: Finde einen fliehenden Astronauten.
description.french: Trouver un astronaute en fuite
description.italian: Trova un astronauta in fuga
description.spanish: Rescata a un astronauta en apuros
description.schinese: 找到逃跑的宇航员
description.russian: Найди убегающего астронавта
description.japanese: 脱走した宇宙飛行士を探せ
description.turkish: Kaçak bir astronotu bul

description.german: Finde ein riesiges grünes Ei.
description.french: Trouver un œuf vert géant
description.italian: Trova un uovo gigante verde
description.spanish: Encuentra un huevo verde brillante
description.schinese: 找到一个巨大的绿色蛋
description.russian: Найди гигантское зеленое яйцо
description.japanese: 緑の巨大卵を探せ
description.turkish: Dev bir yeşil yumurtayı bul

description.german: Finde einen rosa Elefanten.
description.french: Trouver un éléphant rose
description.italian: Trova un elefante rosa
description.spanish: Encuentra un auténtico elefante rosa
description.schinese: 找到一只粉红色的大象
description.russian: Найди розового слона
description.japanese: ピンク象を探せ
description.turkish: Pembe bir fil bul

description.german: Finde eine springende Blume.
description.french: Trouver une fleur sautillante
description.italian: Trova un fiore saltellante
description.spanish: Localiza un ejemplar de esta extraña flor
description.schinese: 寻找跳跃的花朵
description.russian: Найди прыгающий цветок
description.japanese: 飛び跳ねる花を探せ
description.turkish: Zıplayan bir çiçek bul

description.german: Finde einen schwebenden blauen Stein.
description.french: Trouver une pierre bleue flottante
description.italian: Trova una pietra blu galleggiante
description.spanish: Encuentra una piedra azul flotante
description.schinese: 寻找漂浮的蓝色石头
description.russian: Найти плавающий синий камень
description.japanese: 浮く青い石を探せ
description.turkish: Yer değiştiren bir ay taşı bul

description.german: Finde die Truhe von Grialia.
description.french: Trouver le coffre de Grialia
description.italian: Trova lo scrigno di Grialia
description.spanish: Encuentra un tesoro oculto
description.schinese: 找到 Grialia 的箱子
description.russian: Найди сундук Гриалии
description.japanese: Grialiaの箱を探せ
description.turkish: Grialia sandığını bul

description.german: Zerstöre Hydorah.
description.french: Détruire Hydorah
description.italian: Distruggere Hydroah
description.spanish: Destruye a Hydorah
description.schinese: 摧毁 Hydorah
description.russian: Разрушь Хайдору
description.japanese: ハイドーラーを破壊
description.turkish: Hydorah'ı yok et

description.english: Destroy Hydorah and all his seeds.
description.german: Zerstöre Hydorah und alle seine Samen.
description.french: Détruire Hydorah et toutes ses graines
description.italian: Distruggere Hydroah e tutti i suoi semi
description.spanish: Destruye a Hydorah y todas sus semillas
description.schinese: 摧毁 Hydorah 和他所有的子孙
description.russian: Разрушь Хайдору и все её семена
description.japanese: ハイドーラーとその全ての種を破壊
description.turkish: Hydorah'ı ve tüm tohumlarını yok et

description.english: Destroy Hydorah and all his seeds using no continues.
description.german: Zerstöre Hydorah und alle seine Samen, indem du keins benutzt. Nur imi Pilotmodus.
description.french: Détruisez Hydorah et toutes ses graines sans continues, seulement en mode Pilote
description.italian: Distruggi Hydorah e tutti i suoi semi utilizzando non continuare, solo in modalità Pilota
description.spanish: Destruye a Hydorah y todas sus semillas sin continuar, solo en modo Piloto.
description.schinese: 使用不再继续摧毁 Hydorah 和他所有的子孙。仅在飞行员模式下。
description.russian: Разрушь Хайдору и все её семена без использования дополнений. Только в режиме пилот-сигнала.
description.japanese: ハイドーラーとその全ての種を続行を使用しないで破壊。パイロットモード時のみ。
description.turkish: Devam et'i kullanmadan Hydorah'ı ve tüm tohumlarını yok et. Sadece Pilot modunda.

description.english: Find all hidden secrets in the game.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Geheimnisse im Spiel.
description.french: Trouver tous les secrets cachés dans le jeu
description.italian: Trova tutti i segreti nascosti nel gioco
description.spanish: Encuentra el secreto en todas las fases del juego
description.schinese: 在游戏中找到所有隐藏的秘密
description.russian: Найди все секреты в игре
description.japanese: ゲーム中の全ての隠された秘密を探せ
description.turkish: Oyundaki tüm gizli sırları bul

description.german: Erfülle eine Mission mit einer Punktzahl von 50000 Punkten oder mehr.
description.french: Terminer une mission avec un score de 50000 points ou plus
description.italian: Completa la missione con un punteggio di 50000 punti o più
description.spanish: Completa una misión con una puntuación de 50000 puntos o más
description.schinese: 分数为５００００分或以上完成一项任务
description.russian: Заверши миссию со счетом 50 000 очков и больше
description.japanese: ５万点以上のスコアでミッションを完了
description.turkish: Bir görevi 50.000 veya daha fazla puanla tamamla
